argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | istps.a | |- A = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | istps.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` K ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_istps | |- ( K e. TopSp <-> J e. ( TopOn ` A ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_istopon | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` A ) <-> ( J e. Top /\ A = U. J ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_bitri | |- ( K e. TopSp <-> ( J e. Top /\ A = U. J ) ) |
